document_data.name: ''Thunder and Lightning''
document_data.material: [[Silver]]/[[fabric]]The in-game material for the item is given as silver, which may be a reference to it being spun from "silver linings".
document_data.mainbody: e handwraps were excellent at dealing suddenly lethal blows, and also imparted a blast of thunder and lightning with each strike.
document_data.Powers: The handwraps were excellent at dealing suddenly lethal blows, and also imparted a blast of thunder and lightning with each strike.
document_data.History: The handwraps were found after a group including [[Oriphaun Huntsilver]] destroyed Archwizard [[Amskar]]'s [[Amskar's enclave|flying enclave]] over the [[Storm Horns]] mountains, winning victory for [[Cormyr]] from the [[Shadovar]].
